name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clueso: Create studio-style screen recordings and step-by-step guides.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform any ordinary screen-recording into a studio-style video and a step-by-step how-to article with screenshots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Clueso, you’ll create beautiful how-to articles and studio-quality videos for any product or process in minutes.

Just use the Clueso chrome extension to capture a screen-recording of any flow. No preparation, practice, or script required. 

Clueso will transform your screen-recording into a STUDIO-STYLE VIDEO with:

📝 a rewritten script that’s more engaging and conveys the same content in 40% less time.
🎙️ a professional, natural-sounding AI-voicever
🔍 stunning zoom-in effects
🔐 blurred-out sensitive info
™️ your logo and custom branding

Clueso also creates a perfect how-to ARTICLE to go with your video!

✍🏻 Perfectly crafted steps, formatted per technical writing style guides
🖼️ Zoomed-in screenshots or GIFs for every step

Whatever you’re working on, Clueso is here for you!

🫶🏻 Customer education: Create video tutorials and help articles for your product 
👨🏻‍🏫 Employee training: Document internal processes and SOPs for your employees
📢 Product marketing: Create stunning launch videos that will drive engagement
🛠️ Developer onboarding: Onboard new developers with engaging videos and docs
💰 Sales enablement: Level-up your sales team with engaging videos and docs

“Keeping our user guides up to date was a constant challenge as our product evolved. Clueso has solved this problem, making it possible for us to create high quality user guides and videos in a fraction of the time.”

— Tom Marley, Co-founder & CEO @ Played

“We used to spend hours writing articles and creating video guides for our knowledge base. We’d need the right microphone, the right surroundings, and several takes to get things right. God forbid if a collegue accidentally disturbed you in the middle of a recording!
Now, with a few clicks, we have a professional video guide with an easily editable script and no background noise!”

— Nadia Jenayah, Product Adoption Specialist @ Efficy
